title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing water in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing water in a dream is important for many people, but the interpretation varies, and the interpretation differs according to the person’s vision of the vision, whether seeing water in the dream is for a married woman, a widow, a single woman, or an adult man, and as God Almighty said in the Holy Qur’an.” And from water we made every living thing.” Imam Ibn Sirin says that seeing water in a dream indicates abundance. Kindness, nutrition, fertility, and increasing knowledge as well, and you may be interested in meeting the child in a dream. As for Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, he explains seeing water in a dream from the interpretation of this noble verse in what God Almighty said: “And it is He who created man from water, and created for him lineage and in-laws.” . Therefore, the interpretation of seeing water in a dream means marriage. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dreamInterpretation of seeing water in a dreamInterpretation of seeing water in a dreamSeeing water in a dream changes its interpretation according to the person and the situation, and now we explain how the interpretation of Imam Ibn Sirin arrived, the interpretation of a married woman’s dream of water in A dream. If a married woman drinks water in a dream, this portends many good things. If a married woman drinks water from a cup in a dream, this means that she will become pregnant soon. If a married woman drinks a lot of salt water, this indicates the many worries that she is exposed to If a married woman dreams that her husband is digging a well and drinking from it, this indicates that the husband is on his way to earning forbidden money. If a married woman drinks hot water in a dream, this indicates her crises and problems. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing water in a dream for a single woman. We mentioned the honorific verse: “Who created man from water and then made him from lineage and in-laws.” This confirms that seeing water for a woman in a dream indicates a fruitful life, marriage, lineage, and increasing the family. Seeing water in a dream for a man. As for seeing water in a dream for an adult man, it has several indicators, such as: If one sees in a dream that water is abundant, this indicates a decrease in the prices of goods. In the market. If an adult man drinks turbid water in a dream, this indicates the difficulties he will face in his life. If a man drinks large amounts of water during his sleep, this indicates longevity and the blessing of nourishment. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing running water in a dream for a woman Divorced: If a divorced woman sees running water in a dream, this is evidence of her freedom from sorrows. It also suggests that God will compensate her and take care of her from where she least expects. Seeing running water in a dream for a divorced woman means that she is about to marry another person. Seeing running water in a dream for a pregnant woman if she sees A pregnant woman sees running water in a dream, this means that the pregnancy will pass without any problems. If a pregnant woman sees fresh running water in a dream that the water is not clean, this indicates the exhaustion and tension that she will feel during pregnancy. If the pregnant woman is with her husband and sees running water Fresh water in a dream, this indicates the close love between the husband

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a hyena in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a hyena by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a hyena in a dream. It indicates the presence of a woman in the life of a notorious fortune teller. Seeing a hyena’s bone or hair indicates a lot of money that the dreamer will obtain. Dreaming about riding a hyena in a dream is evidence of the famous position in which the dreamer is. A hyena attack The dreamer has evidence of the great sadness and sorrow that he is suffering from. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a single woman. A hyena bite in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of unwanted events and also portends failure. If she sees a hyena being chased and beaten in a dream, this indicates that there is a disreputable person in the He wants to harm her in her life. Seeing a single girl being bitten by a hyena is evidence that there are people who are not good in her life and she must be careful. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a married woman. If she dreams that she is hitting a hyena, this indicates the presence of a paralyzed and immoral person in her life. Overcoming a hyena in The dream indicates that he is among the evil ones. A hyena in a married woman’s dream generally indicates the envy of some. If she sees a hyena tearing her clothes, this indicates that she will get into trouble. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a pregnant woman. A hyena in a dream is pregnant. It indicates the problems that she will fall into and the difficult birth that she will undergo. With it. A hyena in a pregnant woman’s dream shows the negative thinking she is falling into. To hit a hyena in a pregnant woman’s dream means that you are facing some problems and childbirth may be difficult. Interpretation of a dream about a hyena for a manIf a young man sees that he is hitting a hyena in a dream, this means that he will have to save someone There is no problem for him to get into. If a young man sees a hyena barking loudly, these are indications of a problem. Seeing a white hyena in a man’s dream is a sign of feeding a child with a good character and drawing God’s attention to his actions. If a man sees a hyena in a dream attacking him and biting him during If he tries to hit hard, this indicates the presence of a dangerous enemy in the dreamer’s life. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the social situation in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about lice in hair for a single woman. A dream is a group of illusions and events in which a person spends a dream. Life and dreams are divided into a group of types and carry many different varieties in those that indicate goodness and justice in our lives. Interpretation of a dream about lice in hairDreams can be Something positive in a person’s life and it is a message from God Almighty that shows the good that a Muslim is happy with in his life or a warning in seeing a specific matter that could be bad that could affect a person. The interpretation of a dream about lice in hair is: Whoever sees lice in new clothes, then it is an increase in religion, and if it is in the land, then it is a weak people. As for whoever sees a large louse coming out of his body, this indicates his lack of life, and that the louse represents children and charity for them in life. From He saw the comb of his head falling from lice, then he will spend from the inheritance that afflicted him or reveal a defect. Interpretation of a dream about lice for a girl: Dreams are different from dreams, and these are negative and bad things in a person’s life, and they are from Satan, God forbid. A person can see many dreams in his life, and the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, advised seeking refuge from the accursed Satan if something bad happens in the dream and the interpretation of the dream of lice in the hair of a girl who is: The interpretation of the dream of seeing lice crawling without reaching it indicates that this girl will be saved from Trouble, hatred and dislike. Seeing lice in the hair often indicates that the girl is surrounded by a group of bad friends and must be careful in dealing with them. If the girl sees herself getting rid of the lice in her hair and killing them, this indicates her ability to overcome the problems she faces. It indicates White lice in a dream indicates a girl’s ability to achieve the goals she strives for. Seeing black lice in a dream for a single woman There are many positive or bad things that a girl can experience in a dream, and it is a group of desires, desires, and fears that exist in the girl’s subconscious and unconscious mind, These are just dreams that you experience while sleeping. As for seeing black lice in a dream for single people: Seeing black lice indicates bad companions who are trying to seriously harm the girl. Seeing black lice being killed means getting rid of bad companions in life. Black lice in general indicates kindness and prosperity to the owner of this dream. Vision. Seeing a black louse in a dream is evidence that she obtained the highest grades in her studies. Interpretation of a dream about removing lice from the hair of an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream is a group of fantasies that occur during sleep. These dreams are clear and need to be interpreted by guides and experts. As for the interpretation of the dream of removing lice from a woman’s hair, it is: This vision indicates that the girl will emerge and get rid of the problems that surround the person in the current period of his life. Killing lice is getting rid of the debts that the girl is suffering from. Seeing lice killing an unmarried woman means getting rid of Bad friends in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a married woman indicates lice

Killing lice is getting rid of the debts that the girl is suffering from. Seeing lice killing an unmarried woman means getting rid of Bad friends in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a married woman indicates lice

title: A dinar in a dream: Interpretation of a dinar in a dream for a man, a married woman, and a single woman

preview.html: A dinar in a dream indicates useful knowledge as well as religion, and one dinar in a dream indicates a good child, and a large number of dinars is a sign of wisdom and guardianship and may indicate martyrdom. For one who abandons the religious prayer. It was said in the interpretation: The dinar, like the dirham, is God’s rings, and the dinar is necessarily for the children of Adam. Distributing a dinar in a dream. Whoever sees that he is tearing up or distributing a dinar in his dream, then these are good loans that he lends, and the dinar in the hand is evidence of trust, and the metal dinar is plated with gold, copper, or any metal. Another proof of falsehood. And falsehood. Authentic or intact dinars indicate the right to speak or speak, and a counterfeit dinar or tainted with something that the dreamer does not like may indicate his anxiety. The five dinars in a dream indicate the five daily prayers or the provisions of religion, testimony, prayer, zakat, fasting and Hajj, so whoever performs them performs all his duties. As for the ten Dinars are ten months or ten years, so whoever sees in his dream that he is taking it or paying for it, and has a desire in his heart, he will not die until he sees his wishes fulfilled within the aforementioned period. . If you dream that you swallow a dinar, whoever sees in a dream that he swallowed a dinar, then he is rejecting a debt or a child. The dinar in the dream is close to goodness, so whoever sees it and holds it will be far from impurity. The dinar sometimes indicates a deceitful friend or companion, and it may indicate the flattery of friends. A dinar in A woman’s dream: The dinar in a woman’s dream indicates her lover, and evidence of support or maintenance, and in a single woman’s dream, the dowry is given to whoever believes in her, so she asks for her hand in marriage. If in her dream she is happy with this dinar, then this is good news that will calm the eye and calm the mind...one hundred thousand. Seeing the dinar in the pocket. The dinar in the pocket indicates gratitude and loyalty and may indicate guidance and closeness to the ruler. Interpretation of losing a dinar in a dream: Whoever loses the dinar in his dream, then when Waking up, he loses a reward or wage, and if he receives a dinar, he is trustworthy, trustworthy, or trustworthy. The good in a dream is for a man to receive a dinar from a familiar woman, and if it happens to him from a strange man, then the dinar here indicates worries and hardships that the dreamer cannot accept. If she sees A married woman is getting a dinar from her husband. It is good in a dream or dream to see a married woman as if she is getting a dinar or ten dinars from her husband. If in her dream she forgot what she took, then looked for the dinar and did not find it, then this is a trust that was not fulfilled or a will was not carried out by the spouses. Interpretation of a dream about a dinar for a pregnant woman: A dinar in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign. If she sees the image of the ruler engraved on the face of the dinar, she will give birth to a son, God willing. However, if the pregnant woman sees that she is flipping the dinar, she will find nothing but an inscription or writing and symbols without a picture, and she will give birth to a daughter, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream that he receives a dinar with a picture engraved on it and hates its owner, then in his waking life he will face problems and fears from the one who saw his face engraved on a dinar. Interpretation of receiving a dinar A dinar from a dead person in a dream. A married woman who sees in her dream that a dead person she knows gives her a dinar, this is an indication of livelihood. As for a man who dreams of his death, he gives him a dinar.

title: Interpretation of seeing intercourse in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing intercourse in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Visions of intercourse in a dream are among the visions that have many meanings for men and women. The interpretation of the vision varies from one person to another, male or female, and according to the circumstances that each person is going through and according to what the person saw in his dream. We will explain some interpretations of seeing intercourse in a dream for a man and a woman. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse in a dream for an unmarried woman with her lover. In Islam, dreams are a type of spiritual realization. The Qur’an refers to dreams with vision and good tidings. Many theories and observations regarding the interpretation of Islamic dreams have been proposed by many Muslim thinkers and philosophers over the past 1,500 years. Many of these observations and concepts are consistent with recent theories proposed by scientists. Modern Psychology Many of these observations and concepts are consistent with modern theories proposed by modern psychologists. Ibn Sirin, the most famous dream interpreter in the history of Islam, devised a system of dream interpretation based on the fact that both the Hadith and the Qur’an teach Muslims to respect the psychological and spiritual significance of the dream experience. God and dreams are from Satan, so if one of you sees something that he hates, let him blow on his left three times and seek refuge in God from the evil of what he saw and from Satan, then turn to his other side, for this reason. It will not harm him. Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a single woman in love. This vision, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, is a detestable vision, and it shows the girl’s distance from God Almighty, and her distance from morals and the straight path. For a long time, this vision may indicate that this girl is suffering from an illness. If the duration of intercourse is long, the illness will affect her for a long time, but if the duration of intercourse is short, then the duration of her illness is fleeting, while the interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse in a dream is for a woman alone with her lover and feeling happy and fun. This girl will be exposed to some situations, and she will lose the trust of her family, and if she feels guilty, one of her secrets will be revealed or a close friend will claim that her love will hurt her. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse without ejaculation. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream about intercourse without ejaculation. This is evidence of Satan's inability to control him. The explanation may be the inability to achieve goals and the failure of the young man to fulfill his last desires. This is for a man, while a woman may indicate that she feels upset and that she is not responsible, but if she bathes, she will overcome all crises. Dreams are divided into three categories: Good visions: These are real or good dreams that are believed to be from God. Those who live their lives honestly are more likely to achieve true dreams. The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: (Good vision is from God, so if one of you sees what he loves, he should not do it except for whomever he loves) Narrated by Al-Bukhari and the Messenger. He, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: “There is no prophecy except good news: a good dream.” Narrated by Al-Bukhari. Disturbing dreams: It is believed that disturbing dreams are from Satan and anyone who sees a disturbing or unpleasant dream is advised to spit to his left three times when waking up from sleep, asking God

title: Interpretation of a dream about Umrah in a dream, and I did not perform Umrah, by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of Umrah in a dream and I did not perform Umrah by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, Umrah is considered one of the Islamic religious rituals performed by the majority of people, and it is a ritual performed similar to the Hajj rituals, but with fewer rituals than Hajj. Different interpretation books, and we will talk during our article about the interpretation of the dream of Umrah as well as mention all the interpretations of the dream of Umrah from the great interpreter Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of the vision for single, married, pregnant and separated women. Interpretation of the dream of Umrah in a dream Interpretation of the dream of Umrah in a dream Seeing Umrah in a dream is one of the visions that has two sides, the negative side, according to the details of the vision and the condition of the seer, and the positive side of the seer, according to the details and condition of the seer as well. About collecting money for the dreamer. Al-Nabulsi said that seeing Umrah in a dream is generally interpreted as fulfilling the desires and dreams of the dreamer. title: Interpretation of dreams about fainting and someone saved me for singles

preview.html: In the future, as fainting in general is undesirable, and all its interpretations in a dream must be known, especially if the dream is related to events that may occur in the future, and this will be shown in this article via an article. Site.Interpretation of dreams about fainting and someone saved me for the sake of singleness. Interpreters are interested in knowing the interpretations of dreams related to the unmarried girl because they may indicate signs that may cause new events in the future that will change her life. Among the most important interpretations of the dream about fainting, fainting, and the person who saved me for the sake of singleness, and in a dream what The following: When an unmarried woman sees herself unconscious and unconscious in a dream, this means that she will suffer harm in the future, because this dream may indicate a delay in her marriage or her illness. And when an unmarried woman sees herself unconscious and fainting in a dream, this indicates There are differences and disagreements in her life, which makes her hate life. When an unmarried woman sees herself unconscious and unconscious in a dream, this indicates the good luck and happiness that she may obtain in the future. When an unmarried woman sees that she wakes up to the smell of a smart perfume, This indicates the joy that she will wake up in reality. A dream of a single girl fainting may indicate that she will face some problems with her family. When an unmarried woman sees that she has fainted due to the pregnancy in her stomach, this vision indicates that she will fall into misfortunes that will soon disappear. Fainting indicates Until the unmarried woman faces some problems in reality, as the vision differs in that there are problems regarding the issue of her marriage to a specific person and she faces some problems because of him. These problems may be health or psychological and you are facing unpleasant and sad news. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about falling to the ground Interpretation Dreams of fainting and someone saved me for singles. A dream of fainting as a result of a dream indicates the presence of pregnancy, and this indicates that this girl will face many problems. Or she will communicate with a person who does not suit her, and who will create problems for her in the next life, making her face many worries and difficulties. Dreaming of a girl fainting due to food poisoning indicates that the girl will face problems with her friends, problems with her family, psychological problems, or emotional problems in the next life. Seeing repeated fainting spells in a dream means that the dreamer will face major health problems, as scientists say that the interpretation of this vision may It indicates the arrival of happy news to the dreamer in the coming period. When the dreamer wakes up from a dream about something good and good and that this fainting occurred on one of the happy occasions in reality. Or that the fainting occurred and was overcome by seeing an encounter with a man who is handsome in appearance and appearance, then these are all among the best visions. Al-Mahmoudah in interpretations of fainting. Ibn Shaheen says that frequent fainting in a dream means hearing good news if the dreamer is patient with something and is waiting for an important event in his next life. When fainting occurs in a dream, it indicates the good that will befall that girl. See also: Interpretation

title: Interpretation of the dream of traveling to America in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of traveling to America in a dream. Interpretation of the vision of traveling to America in a dream is one of the visions that promise the dreamer good and happiness. Traveling to America in a dream with difficulties indicates extreme fatigue and failure that the dreamer will suffer from. The student who sees himself in a dream of traveling to America also indicates Academic excellence and success. Seeing a trip to America in a dream is a sign of fulfilling desires and obtaining successful opportunities. Seeing travel in a dream generally represents a change in the dreamer’s life and the emergence of some fluctuations. Seeing a trip to America with a familiar person indicates the success of relationships and mutual reconciliation. Interpretation A trip to America in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing a trip to America and a long journey for single people indicates a calm and stable life. But seeing the difficulty of traveling in a dream for a girl is considered one of the problems she will suffer and lost opportunities. Seeing traveling to America by plane in a dream for a single woman is evidence that she will enter In a happy romantic relationship. An easy and happy trip in an unmarried woman’s dream is considered a praiseworthy vision and a sign of marriage and good work. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to America for a married woman: Seeing a married woman traveling to America in a dream means that she will reap a lot of goodness and livelihood in her life. The dream of a woman traveling With her husband to America indicates great happiness and the birth of children. Traveling in a woman’s dream indicates the transition to a new life and the emergence of many pleasant changes for her. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to America for a divorced woman. Seeing traveling to America in a dream indicates for a divorced woman relief, getting rid of anxiety, and ending worries and sorrow. It is also a dream of traveling to America for a divorced woman, for the good and large livelihood that she will obtain in her life. Seeing a woman traveling with her ex-husband and facing difficulties indicates the problems that haunt her with that person. Interpretation of a dream of traveling to America for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of a trip to America in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the praiseworthy visions that shows her nourishment and her child who will be fair. Seeing traveling to America by train in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the ease of her birth. Interpretation of a dream about traveling to America with the familyTravelling to America with the family in a dream, and the trip was stable and not difficult This is good news of the joys and good things that will befall them. Interpretation of a dream about living in America: seeing him living in America and settling there suggests that the dreamer will emerge from the difficulties and problems he was facing. But seeing himself living in America and being chased by the police or people indicates the many problems that the dreamer faces because of his enemies. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: What is the interpretation of attachment in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Attachment in a dream, it symbolizes passion, love, tenderness, compassion and kindness. It also indicates marriage between two strangers or reconciliation of quarrels. It can indicate the long life of the pioneer and also shows longing and longing for someone. Attachment to the dreamInterpretation of the dream of attachment When one dreams that he is joining someone he recently met, this indicates the consolidation of the relationship between them or indicates the dreamer entering into a new emotional relationship. But if the dreamer dreams that It is about an elderly person with whom he has an old emotional relationship. This indicates longing for this person and that old relationship, the dreamer’s constant thinking about that person, and the dreamer’s desire to return to that relationship. Repeatedly. Also, sometimes a hug indicates separation and the end of a relationship or the occurrence of many crises. When a dreamer dreams of hugging his friend, this indicates their intense love and devotion to each other. Attachment to a dream by Ibn SirinWhen a person sees a hug in a dream, this is a vision that shows the long life of the pioneer and that the hug of the living Or the dead has the same interpretation as before. Hugging is also described as renewing blood cells in the human body, which means that it renews a person’s life and changes the dreamer’s condition for the better. The hug also suggests that there is strong trust between the dreamer and the hugger and that their relationship is characterized by honesty, strength and sincerity. Which has a website on the Secrets of Dream Interpretation from Google, You can see many interpretations and questions about followers. Attachment to a dream by Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi explains that imprisoning a pregnant woman in a dream indicates her poor psychological state and the deterioration of her health, due to her frustration with the words and actions that harm her during this period from those close to her who led her. To despair of life. Attachment to a dream for single people When an unmarried woman dreams of hugging or embracing someone, this indicates marriage to a good young man with good qualities and her life will be full of happiness, love and stability. Embracing an unmarried woman in a dream indicates her success in her studies or work or completing Things that she seeks and the arrival of many good things for her in the coming days. Attachment in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees an embrace in her dream, this symbolizes that she will become pregnant in the coming days and that God will give her a new baby, but if the embrace is accompanied by crying, this means separation. And the relationship ends. Hugging in a dream about a pregnant woman. When a pregnant woman dreams of her husband imprisoning her, this indicates her intense love for her husband, her attachment to him, and the presence of affection and compassion between them. However, if a pregnant woman dreams that she is embracing a boy, this is evidence that she is pregnant with a girl, and vice versa. Attachment in a dream for a divorced woman. When a divorced woman sees hugs. In a dream, this indicates happy and good days that will soon come, and God will compensate her for the days in which she suffered from sadness. It also indicates that God will bless her with a good husband who has good qualities and fears God in her, and who will be in her place. However, if a divorced woman dreams that she has her ex-husband, this is evidence of her longing. . . Who is she?

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream for singles, married people, and men

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream Seeing rabbits in a dream is one of the things that many people are exposed to seeing, which indicates many different meanings and connotations, which vary according to the situation in which they come, and which vary according to the situation of the viewer and through it in this. An article that we will learn about in the best interpretations, and this is said to see rabbits in a dream. Interpretation of seeing rabbits in a dream for men: If he sees them and their color is brown, this is evidence that the viewer enjoys greatness and pride and is one of the figures of great value in life, and if he sees them and has a limited income, then this is evidence of that. Earning a living and gaining high positions. Ibn Shaheen believed that if he saw himself kissing him, this is evidence of his ill treatment of his wife in reality, but if he was a single young man, this indicates a severing of ties and that he does not heal his family and relatives. That pleases God and indicates the difficulties and problems to which the dreamer is exposed. Interpretation of catching rabbits in a dream: If he sees that he is chasing him or trying to aim at him or shoot him, this is a sign of success and profit in the future. Al-Nabulsi said, as he watched the priest trying to catch him, that he obtained An inheritance, a lot of money, and perhaps a large financial reward. It was also said that he sold something that belonged to the priest for a large sum. When he sees it in white, it shows exposure to exhaustion or contamination from some diseases and health problems, and as some scholars said, it shows exposure to injustice in the field of work, and God - Most High - is Most High and All-Knowing. . To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. A black rabbit in a dream. If he sees that it bears the color black, this is an indication of the fulfillment of the desires and aspirations that the dreamer dreamed of in his real life, and it also shows qualities. Beauty for the dreamer, including intelligence. And courage. When you see it in the house and its color is black, this indicates freedom from worries and freedom from problems and judgments, as well as joy, happiness, profit, and hearing good news. The white rabbit in the dream, and if he sees it while it is white, it is good news for her, and it indicates the opening of the heart and chest, and is evidence of her hearing the beautiful and good news. If it is brown in the dream, it is a sign of emotional stability, but if it is black, it is an indication of the fulfillment of desires and ambitions. Sources: - 1- Dictionary of Interpretation of Dreams, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi, Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 2- Book of Signs In the world of camels, the blessed Imam, Ghars al-Din Khalil bin Shaheen al-Dhaheri, researched by Sayyed Kasrawi Hassan, Dar al-Kutub al-Ilmiyyah, Beirut 1993.3- The book on perfumes in expressing dreams, Sheikh Abdul-Ghani al-Nabulsi.
